front.title: Non-Access-Stratum (NAS) functions related to Mobile Station (MS) in idle mode
front.abstract: This specification shall give an overview of the tasks undertaken by a Mobile Station (MS) when in idle mode, that is, switched on but not having a dedicated channel allocated, e.g. not making or receiving a call, or when in group receive mode, that is, receiving a group call or broadcast call but not having a dedicated connection. It also describes the corresponding network functions.
